org.dotplot.core.services
Interface IJob<C extends IFrameworkContext>

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractJob, BatchJob, ImagerJob, PlotterJob, PluginLoadingJob, ShutdownJob, StartUpJob, StorePreferencesJob, TestJob, UsePreferenceJob
public interface IJob<C extends IFrameworkContext>

Author:
Christian Gerhardt

getErrorHandler

IErrorHandler getErrorHandler()
Returns the ErrorHandler.

Returns:
The ErrorHandler.

process

boolean process(C context)
This method starts the processing of the job.

Invokers of this method should use validatePreconditions() before invoking this method.

Parameters:
context - The FrameworkContext for processing the Job.
Returns:
- true if the job was successfully processed, false otherwise.
See Also:
validatePreconditions(IServiceRegistry)

validatePreconditions

boolean validatePreconditions(IServiceRegistry registry)
Validates the preconditions for processing the Job.

This method serves primary for checking if all nessesary Services for processing the Job are registered to the ServiceRegistry. But implementers should feel free to check every precondition they linke.

Parameters:
registry - The ServiceRegistry for validating.
Returns:
true if the preconditions are validated, false otherwise.

setTaskProcessor

void setTaskProcessor(ITaskProcessor processor)
Sets the TaskProcessor.

The set TaskProcessor is used for processing Services.

Parameters:
processor - The TaskProcessor.
See Also:
IService, ITask, ITaskPart
